meanings.definition: A person or party who enters into a covenant or agreement.
meanings.sent1: The covenantees signed the contract together.
meanings.sent2: The covenantees agreed to abide by the rules.
meanings.sent3: The covenantees shook hands to seal the deal.
meanings.sent4: The covenantees were like puzzle pieces fitting perfectly together.
meanings.sent5: The covenantees promised to work as a team for the project.

meanings.definition: The individuals or entities who are bound by the terms of a covenant.
meanings.sent1: All the covenantees attended the meeting to discuss the agreement.
meanings.sent2: The covenantees followed the guidelines set in the covenant.
meanings.sent3: The covenantees threw a party to celebrate their commitment.
meanings.sent4: The covenantees were like stars in the sky, each shining brightly.
meanings.sent5: The covenantees were united in their dedication to the cause.
